content:
If you've ever been the proud owner of a mini-chemistry set as a child (or adult!), you'll love the idea behind Dark Roasted Blend's 
. Some of the images are totally amazing.


While some of the pics are obviously and admittedly Photoshopped, others are completely natural, emanating gentle swirling, curling white clouds that form unique and original works of art.
Beats the standard lame smoke rings, eh?
title: Sensational Smoke Art
author: Linda
